alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 03 at 11:43PM EDT until July 05 at 6:31AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Merrimack and Belknap Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Suncook River at North Chichester. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water up to Bachelder Road in Allenstown. Waterfront campsites impacted, campers should move to higher ground. At 9.0 feet, Flooding occurs at multiple campgrounds in the region. Water approaches homes along Bachelder Road and properties along Riverside Park Drive in Allenstown. Buck Street in Epsom floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 8.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
